title: Candle Statistics
content:
This indicator displays volume and delta information on each candle.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Settings

NameDescription
Label location Specifies the display location of the label.

Options:
  • Above the candle
  • Below the candle
  • By candle direction
Volume Determines whether to display volume information.
Delta Determines whether to display information about delta.
Trades count Determines whether to display information about the number of trades.
Show duration Determines whether to display information about the time duration of the candle.
Clusters mode If enabled, the label is displayed only in cluster mode

Visualization

NameDescription
Volume Sets the color of the volume element.
Positive delta Displays the color of an element with a positive value.
Negative Delta Displays the color of an element with a negative value.
Trades Determines whether to display information about the number of trades.
Duration Determines whether to display information about the number of trades.
Background Sets the background color of the label.
Hide background This option hides the display of the label background.
Font Specifies various settings for the font.
Offset Sets the y-axis offset of the label in pixels.
Border width Sets the width of the border of the displayed element (in pixels).
Transparency This setting allows users to customize transparency of the visual objects on the chart.
